title: Championship Skins This Year
body: I think they should realease the championship skins for a limited time  this  year for the people that main those champs but weren't around when the skins came out. it would please the fans and it would make you a bit more money. lol just a thought

replies.body: Championship Thresh and Shyvana will be re-released after the Worlds 2015 finals, Championship Riven however is limited and will never be released again (that's what they said).

Yup! Championship Thresh and Shyvana will come back! 

Since Riven is limited, not legacy, she may or may not come back to the store again. As Hippalus mentioned last year, "most limited edition skins took four years to come back after release, and it's been two years for Riven so far."

Rivens............Rivens everywhere!!!!


But I do hope her skin comes back.

The only other decent skin she has is dragonblade and that ones legacy.
